utsarga lokottara patha upeta tayā atṛpta bodhyaṅga saṃbhāra upacaya tayā satata samitam uttarottara viśeṣa parimārgaṇa tayā

original: evaṃrūpairbhavanto jinaputrā bhūmipariśodhakairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ supratiṣṭhito bhavati pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau //
analyzed: evaṃrūpaiḥ bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bhūmi pariśodhakaiḥ dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bodhisattvaḥ su pratiṣṭhitaḥ bhavati pramuditāyām bodhisattva bhūmau

original: so 'syāṃ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāpraṇidhānāni
analyzed: saḥ asyām pramuditāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ san imāni evaṃrūpāṇi mahā praṇidhānāni
mahā vyavasāyān mahā abhinirhārān abhinirharati yat uta aśeṣa niḥśeṣa anavaśeṣa sarva buddha pūjā upasthāpanāya
sarva ākāra vara upetam udāra adhimukti viśuddham dharmadhātu vipulam ākāśa dhātu paryavasānam aparānta koṭi niṣṭham
sarva kalpa saṃkhyā buddha utpādam saṃkhyā pratiprasrabdham mahā pūjā upasthānāya prathamam mahā praṇidhānam abhinirharati
yat uta sarva tathāgata bhāṣita dharma netrī saṃdhāraṇāya sarva buddha bodhisattva su parigrahāya sarva samyaksaṃbuddha śāsana parirakṣaṇāya buddha utpāda saddharma parigrahāya
dvitīyam
yat uta sarva buddha utpāda niravaśeṣa sarva lokadhātu prasareṣu tuṣita bhavana vāsam ādim kṛtvā

cyavanā saṃkramaṇa garbha sthiti janma kumāra krīḍā antaḥpura vāsa abhiniṣkramaṇa duṣkara caryā bodhi maṇḍa upasaṃkramaṇa māra gharṣaṇa abhisaṃbodhi adhyeṣaṇa mahā dharma cakra pravartana mahā parinirvāṇa upasaṃkramaṇāya
pūjā dharma saṃgraha prayoga pūrvaṃgamam kṛtvā sarvatra eka kāla vivartanāya buddha utpāda
yāvat mahā parinirvāṇa upasaṃkramaṇāya tṛtīyam
yat uta sarva bodhisattva caryā vipula mahadgata apramāṇa asaṃbhinna sarva pāramitā saṃgṛhīta sarva bhūmi pariśodhanam
sa aṅga upāṅga nirhāra salakṣaṇa saṃvarta vivarta sarva bodhisattva caryā bhūta yathāvat bhūmi patha upadeśa pāramitā parikarma avavāda anuśāsanī anupradāna upastabdha citta utpāda abhinirhārāya
caryā citta utpāda abhinirhārāya caturtham
yat uta niravaśeṣa sarva sattva dhātu rūpya rūpi saṃjñā saṃjñinā eva saṃjñinā asaṃjñā aṇḍa ja jarāyu ja saṃsveda ja aupapāduka
traidhātuka paryāpanna ṣaṣ gati samavasṛta sarva upapatti paryāpanna nāma rūpa saṃgṛhīta aśeṣa sarva sattvadhātu paripācanāya
sarva buddha dharma avatāraṇāya sarva gati saṃkhyā vyavacchedanāya sarvajña jñāna pratiṣṭhāpanāya
sattvadhātu sarva sattvadhātu paripācanāya pañcamam

yat uta niravaśeṣa sarva lokadhātu vipula saṃkṣipta mahadgata apramāṇa sūkṣma audārika vyatyasta avamūrdha sama tala praveśa sama vara saraṇa anugata indrajāla vibhāga daśa diś aśeṣa vimātra tā vibhāga praveśa jñāna anugama pratyakṣa tāyai
yat uta sarva kṣetra eka kṣetra eka kṣetra sarva kṣetra samavasaraṇa pariśodhanam apramāṇa buddhakṣetra prabhā vyūha alaṃkāra pratimaṇḍitam
sarva kleśa apanayana pariśuddha patha upetam apramāṇa jñāna ākara sattva paripūrṇam udāra buddha viṣaya samavasaraṇam
yathā āśaya sarva sattva saṃdarśana saṃtoṣaṇāya buddhakṣetra sarva buddhakṣetra pariśodhanāya saptamam
yat uta sarva bodhisattva eka āśaya prayoga tāyai niḥsapatna kuśala mūla upacayāya eka ālambana sarva bodhisattva samatāyai
avirahita satata samita buddha bodhisattva samavadhānāya yathā iṣṭa buddha utpāda saṃdarśanāya
sva citta utpāda tathāgata prabhāva jñāna anugamāya acyuta anugāminī abhijñā pratilambhāya sarva lokadhātu anuvicaraṇāya
sarva buddha parṣad maṇḍala pratibhāsa prāptaye sarva upapatti sva śarīra anugamāya acintya mahāyāna upeta tāyai
bodhisattva caryā caraṇa a vyavacchedāya caryā mahāyāna avatāraṇāya aṣṭamam
yat uta a vivartya cakra samārūḍha bodhisattva caryā caraṇāya amogha kāya vāc manaḥ karmaṇe
saha darśana niyata buddha dharma tvāya saha ghoṣa udāhāra jñāna anugamāya saha prasāda kleśa vinivartanāya
mahā bhaiṣajya rāja upama āśraya pratilambhāya cintāmaṇi vat kāya pratilambhāya sarva bodhisattva caryā caraṇāya

yat uta sarva lokadhātuṣu anuttara samyaksaṃbodhi abhisaṃbodhāya eka vāla pathā vyativṛtta sarva bāla pṛthagjana janma upapati abhiniṣkramaṇa vikurvaṇa bodhimaṇḍa dharma cakra pravartana mahāparinirvāṇa upadarśanāya
mahābuddha viṣaya prabhāva jñāna anugamāya sarva sattvadhātu yathā āśaya buddha utpāda kṣaṇa kṣaṇa vibhaṅga vibodha praśama prāpaṇa saṃdarśanāya
eka abhisaṃbodhi sarva dharma nirmāṇa spharaṇāya eka ghoṣa udāhāra sarva sattva citta āśaya saṃtoṣaṇāya
mahāparinirvāṇa upadarśana caryā bala a vyavacchedāya mahā jñāna bhūmi sarva dharma vyavasthāpana saṃdarśanāya
dharma jñāna ṛddhi māyā abhijñā sarva lokadhātu spharaṇāya abhisaṃbodhi mahā jñāna abhijñā abhinirhārāya daśamam

original: iti hi bhavanto jinaputrā imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāpraṇidhānāni mahāvyavasāyān mahābhinirhārān
analyzed: iti hi bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ imāni evaṃrūpāṇi mahā praṇidhānāni mahā vyavasāyān mahā abhinirhārān

original: daśa praṇidhānamukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśapraṇidhānāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: daśa praṇidhāna mukhāni pramukham kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśa praṇidhāna asaṃkhyeya śata sahasrāṇi

original: yāni bodhisattvaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito 'bhinirharati pratilabhate ca //
analyzed: yāni bodhisattvaḥ pramuditāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ abhinirharati pratilabhate ca
tāni ca mahā praṇidhānāni daśabhiḥ niṣṭhāpadaiḥ abhinirharati
katamaiḥ daśabhiḥ

original: yaduta sattvadhātuniṣṭhayā ca lokadhātuniṣṭhayā ca ākāśadhātuniṣṭhayā ca dharmadhātuniṣṭhayā
analyzed: yat uta sattvadhātu niṣṭhayā ca lokadhātu niṣṭhayā ca ākāśa dhātu niṣṭhayā ca dharmadhātu niṣṭhayā

original: ca nirvāṇadhātuniṣṭhayā ca buddhotpādadhātuniṣṭhayā ca tathāgatajñānadhātuniṣṭhayā
analyzed: ca nirvāṇa dhātu niṣṭhayā ca buddha utpāda dhātu niṣṭhayā ca tathāgata jñāna dhātu niṣṭhayā

original: ca cittālambanadhātuniṣṭhayā ca buddhaviṣayajñānapraveśadhātuniṣṭhayāḥ ca lokavartanīdharmavartanījñānavartanīdhātuniṣṭhayā ca /
analyzed: ca citta ālambana dhātu niṣṭhayā ca buddha viṣaya jñāna praveśa dhātu niṣṭhayāḥ ca loka vartanī dharma vartanī jñāna vartanī dhātu niṣṭhayā ca
iti hi yā niṣṭhā sattvadhātu niṣṭhāyāḥ

original: sā me niṣṭhā eṣāṃ mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: sā me niṣṭhā eṣām mahā praṇidhānānām bhavatu
yā niṣṭhā yāvajjñāna vartanī dhātu niṣṭhāyāḥ

original: sā me niṣṭhā eṣāṃ mahāpraṇidhānānāṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: sā me niṣṭhā eṣām mahā praṇidhānānām bhavatu
iti hi aniṣṭhā sattvadhātu niṣṭhā
aniṣṭhāni imāni me kuśala mūlāni bhavantu
aniṣṭhā yāvajjñāna vartanī dhātu niṣṭhā
aniṣṭhāni imāni me kuśala mūlāni bhavantu iti

original: sa evaṃ svabhinirhṛtapraṇidhānaḥ karmaṇyacitto mṛducitto 'saṃhāryaśraddho bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ evam su abhinirhṛta praṇidhānaḥ karmaṇi acittaḥ mṛdu cittaḥ asaṃhārya śraddhaḥ bhavati
saḥ abhiśraddadhāti tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām pūrva anta caryā abhinirhāra praveśam
pāramitā samudāgamam bhūmi pariniṣpattim vaiśeṣika tām bala pariniṣpattim vaiśāradya paripūrim āveṇika buddha dharma a saṃhārya tām acintyām
buddha dharmatām ananta madhyam tathāgata viṣaya abhinirhāram aparimāṇa jñāna anugatam tathāgata gocara anupraveśam
phala pariniṣpattim abhiśraddadhāti
samāsatas sarva bodhisattva caryām yāvat tathāgata bhūmi jñāna nirdeśa adhiṣṭhānam abhiśraddadhāti

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - evaṃ gambhīrāḥ khalu punarime buddhadharmāḥ evaṃ viviktāḥ evaṃ
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati evam gambhīrāḥ khalu punar ime buddha dharmāḥ evam viviktāḥ evam

original: śāntāḥ evaṃ śūnyāḥ evamānimittāḥ evamapraṇihitāḥ evaṃ nirupalepāḥ evaṃ vipulāḥ evamaparimāṇāḥ
analyzed: śāntāḥ evam śūnyāḥ evam ānimittāḥ evam apraṇihitāḥ evam nirupalepāḥ evam vipulāḥ evam aparimāṇāḥ
evam udārāḥ evam durāsadāḥ ca ime buddha dharmāḥ

original: atha ca punarime bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā avidyāndhakāraparyavanaddhamānasena
analyzed: atha ca punar ime bāla pṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭi patitayā saṃtatyā avidyā andhakāra paryavanaddha mānasena
māna dhvaja samucchritaiḥ saṃkalpaiḥ tṛṣṇā jāla abhilaṣitaiḥ manasikāraiḥ māyā śāṭhya gahana anucaritaiḥ citta āśayaiḥ īrṣyā mātsarya saṃprayuktaiḥ gati upapatti prayogaiḥ
rāga dveṣa moha paricitaiḥ karma upacayaiḥ krodha upanāha saṃdhukṣitābhiḥ citta jvālābhiḥ viparyāsa saṃprayuktaiḥ
karma kriyā abhinirhāraiḥ kāma bhava avidyā srava anubaddhaiḥ citta manaḥ vijñāna bījaiḥ traidhātuke
punarbhava aṅkuram abhinirvartayanti yat idam nāma rūpa sahaja avi nirbhāga gatam

original: tenaiva ca nāmarūpeṇa vivardhitena eṣāṃ ṣaḍāyatanagrāmaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: tena eva ca nāma rūpeṇa vivardhitena eṣām ṣaṣ āyatana grāmaḥ saṃbhavati
saṃbhūteṣu āyataneṣu anyonya sparśa nipātataḥ vedanā saṃbhavati

original: tāmeva vedanāṃ bhūyo bhūyo 'bhinandatāṃ tṛṣṇopādānaṃ vivardhate /
analyzed: tām eva vedanām bhūyas bhūyas abhinandatām tṛṣṇā upādānam vivardhate
vivṛddhe tṛṣṇā upādāne bhavaḥ saṃbhavati
saṃbhūte ca bhave jāti jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsāḥ prādurbhavanti

original: evameteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandho 'bhinirvartate ātmātmīyavigato riktastucchaḥ śūnyo nirīho niśceṣṭo jaḍastṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavartmapratibhāsopamaḥ
analyzed: evam eteṣām sattvānām duḥkha skandhaḥ abhinirvartate ātma ātmīya vigataḥ riktaḥ tucchaḥ śūnyaḥ nirīhaḥ niśceṣṭaḥ jaḍaḥ tṛṇa kāṣṭha kuḍya vartma pratibhāsa upamaḥ
na ca evam avabudhyante iti

original: teṣāmevaṃrūpeṇa sattvānāṃ duḥkhaskandhāvipramokṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sattveṣu mahākaruṇonmiñjaḥ saṃbhavati - ete 'smābhiḥ sattvāḥ paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyā  #
analyzed: teṣām evaṃrūpeṇa sattvānām duḥkha skandha a vipramokṣam dṛṣṭvā sattveṣu mahā karuṇā unmiñjaḥ saṃbhavati ete asmābhiḥ sattvāḥ paritrātavyāḥ parimocayitavyāḥ
dbh
atas mahā saṃmohāt
atyanta sukhe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iti
atas asya mahā maitrī unmiñjaḥ saṃbhavati

original: evaṃ kṛpāmaitryanugatena khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvo 'dhyāśayena prathamāyāṃ
analyzed: evam kṛpā maitrī anugatena khalu punar bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśayena prathamāyām

original: bodhisattvabhūmau vartamānaḥ sarvavastuṣu sāpekṣacittaṃ parivarjya buddhajñāne ca
analyzed: bodhisattva bhūmau vartamānaḥ sarva vastuṣu sāpekṣa cittam parivarjya buddha jñāne ca
udāra spṛhā abhilāṣa buddhiḥ mahā tyāgeṣu prayuñjate

original: sa ya ime tyāgāḥ - yaduta dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraparityāgo vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataparityāgo
analyzed: sa ye ime tyāgāḥ yat uta dhana dhānya kośa koṣṭhāgāra parityāgaḥ vā hiraṇya suvarṇa maṇi muktā vaiḍūrya śaṅkha śilā pravāla jātarūpa rajata parityāgaḥ

original: vā ratnābharaṇavibhūṣaṇaparityāgo vā hayarathagajapativāhanaparityāgo vā udyānatapovanavihāraparityāgo
analyzed: vā ratna ābharaṇa vibhūṣaṇa parityāgaḥ vā haya ratha gaja pati vāhana parityāgaḥ vā udyāna tapaḥ vana vihāra parityāgaḥ
vā dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣeya parityāgaḥ vā grāma nagara nigama janapada rāṣṭra rājadhānī parityāgaḥ
vā bhāryā putra duhitṛ parityāgaḥ vā sarva priya manāpa vastu parityāgaḥ vā śiraḥ karṇa nāsā kara caraṇa nayana sva māṃsa śoṇita asthi majjā medaḥ chavi carma hṛdaya sarva ātma bhāva parityāgaḥ

original: teṣvanapekṣo bhūtvā sarvavastuṣu buddhajñāne ca udāraspṛhābhilāṣabuddhiḥ parityajati /
analyzed: teṣu anapekṣaḥ bhūtvā sarva vastuṣu buddha jñāne ca udāra spṛhā abhilāṣa buddhiḥ parityajati

original: evaṃ hyasya prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya mahātyāgaḥ saṃbhavati //
analyzed: evam hi asya prathamāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya mahā tyāgaḥ saṃbhavati

original: sa evaṃ karuṇāmaitrītyāgāśayo bhūtvā sarvasattvaparitrāṇārthaṃ bhūyo bhūyo laukikalokottarānarthān parimārgate parigaveṣate /
analyzed: saḥ evam karuṇā maitrī tyāga āśayaḥ bhūtvā sarva sattva paritrāṇa artham bhūyas bhūyas laukika lokottarān arthān parimārgate parigaveṣate
parimārgamāṇaḥ parigaveṣamāṇaḥ ca a parikheda cittam utpādayati
evam asya a parikhedaḥ saṃbhavati
aparikhinnaḥ ca sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ bhavati
atas asya śāstra jña tā saṃbhavati

original: sa evaṃ śāstropetaḥ kriyākriyāvicāritayā buddhyā hīnamadhyapraṇīteṣu sattveṣu tathatvāya pratipadyate yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam /
analyzed: saḥ evam śāstra upetaḥ kriyā akriyā vicāritayā buddhyā hīna madhya praṇīteṣu sattveṣu tathatvāya pratipadyate yathābalam yathā bhajamānam
atas asya loka jña tā saṃbhavati

original: lokajñaśca kālavelāmātracārī hryapatrāpyavibhūṣitayā saṃtatyā ātmārthaparārtheṣu prayujyate /
analyzed: loka jñaḥ ca kālavelā mātra cārī hrī apatrāpya vibhūṣitayā saṃtatyā ātma artha para artheṣu prayujyate
atas asya hrī apatrāpyam saṃbhavati

original: teṣu ca prayogeṣu naiṣkramyacārī avivartyāpratyudāvartyabalādhānaprāpto bhavati /
analyzed: teṣu ca prayogeṣu naiṣkramya cārī a vivartya a pratyudāvartya bala ādhāna prāptaḥ bhavati
evam asya dhṛti bala ādhānam ājatam bhavati
dhṛti bala ādhāna prāptaḥ ca tathāgata pūjā upasthāneṣu prayujyate
śāsane ca pratipadyate

original: evaṃ hyasyeme daśa bhūmipariśodhakā dharmā ājātā bhavanti /
analyzed: evam hi asya ime daśa bhūmi pariśodhakāḥ dharmāḥ ājātāḥ bhavanti

original: tadyathā - śraddhā karuṇā maitrī tyāgaḥ khedasahiṣṇutā śāstrajñatā lokajñatā hryapatrāpyaṃ dhṛtibalādhānaṃ tathāgatapūjopasthānamiti //
analyzed: tat yathā  śraddhā karuṇā maitrī tyāgaḥ kheda sahiṣṇu tā śāstra jña tā loka jña tā hrī apatrāpyam dhṛti bala ādhānam tathāgata pūjā upasthānam iti

original: tasya asyāṃ pramuditāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti audārikadarśanena praṇidhānabalena ca /
analyzed: tasya asyām pramuditāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavaḥ buddhāḥ ābhāsam āgacchanti audārika darśanena praṇidhāna balena ca

original: bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhanayutaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: bahūni buddha śatāni bahūni buddha sahasrāṇi bahūni buddha śata sahasrāṇi bahūni buddha nayuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: bahavo buddhakoṭyo bahūni buddhakoṭīśatāni bahūni buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: bahavaḥ buddha koṭyaḥ bahūni buddha koṭī śatāni bahūni buddha koṭī sahasrāṇi bahūni buddha koṭī śata sahasrāṇi
bahūni buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāṇi ābhāsam āgacchanti audārika darśanena praṇidhāna balena ca

original: sa tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān dṛṣṭvā udārādhyāśayena satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati,
analyzed: sa tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān dṛṣṭvā udāra adhyāśayena satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati
cīvara piṇḍapātra śayāna āsana glāna pratyaya bhaiṣajya pariṣkāraiḥ ca pratipādayati
bodhisattva sukha upadhānam ca upasaṃharati
saṃgha gaṇa saṃmāna tām ca karoti

te asmābhiḥ bhūtapatha samyagdṛṣṭi mārga yāthātathye pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

te asmābhiḥ anuttare mahā maitrī upasaṃhāre pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ
atṛptāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ para vitta abhilāṣiṇaḥ viṣama ājīva anucaritāḥ

original: mahāmohatamastimirapaṭalāvidyāndhakārāvṛtā bateme sattvā mahāndhakāragahanānupraviṣṭāḥ prajñālokasudūrībhūtā mahāndhakārapraskannāḥ kudṛṣṭikāntārasamavasṛtāḥ

teṣām asmābhiḥ anāvaraṇam prajñā cakṣuḥ viśodhayitavyam yathā sarva dharma yāthātathya apara praṇaya tām pratilapsyante
mahā saṃsāra aṭavī kāntāra mārga prapannāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ a yogakṣemiṇaḥ anāśvāsa prāptāḥ mahā prapāta patitā

original: te 'smābhirevaṃvidhāt saṃsārāṭavīkāntāradurgāduttārayitavyā abhayapure ca sarvajñatānagare nirupadrave nirupatāpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /

mahā ogha ūrmi āmathaiḥ nimagnāḥ bata ime sattvāḥ kāma bhava avidyā dṛṣṭi ogha samavasṛṣṭāḥ saṃsāra srotaḥ nuvāhinaḥ tṛṣṇā nadī prapannā
mahā vega grastāḥ a vilokana samarthāḥ kāma vyāpāda vihiṃsā vitarka pratāna anucaritāḥ satkāya dṛṣṭi udaka rākṣasa gṛhītāḥ
kāma gahana āvarta anupraviṣṭāḥ nandī rāga madhya saṃchannāḥ asmimāna sthala utsannāḥ dauḥśīlya viṣama ācāra antaḥpuṭībhūtāḥ
ṣaṣ āyatana grāma bhaya tīram anuccalitāḥ kuśala saṃtāraka virahitāḥ anāthāḥ

original: te 'smābhirmahākaruṇākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave 'rajasi kṣeme śive 'bhaye sarvabhayatrāsāpagate sarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: vajragarbha āha - yo 'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaścaturthyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparipūrṇamārgaḥ pañcamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavatarati,

katamābhiḥ daśabhiḥ
yat uta atīta buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca anāgata buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā
ca pratyutpanna buddha dharma viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca śīla viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca
citta viśuddhi āśaya samatayā ca dṛṣṭi kāṅkṣā vimati vilekhā apanayana viśuddhi āśaya samatayā

ābhiḥ daśabhiḥ citta āśaya viśuddhi samatābhiḥ avatarati

original: sa khalu punarbhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ pañcamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanuprāptaḥ

bhūyas uttara kāla mārga viśeṣam abhiprārthayamānaḥ tathatva anupratipannaḥ ca praṇidhāna bala ādhānataḥ ca

a pratihata cittaḥ ca bhavati bodhi citta mahā upāya kauśalya saṃdhi upasaṃhita loka pracāra tayā
rātriṃdivam anya citta parivarjitaḥ ca bhavati sarva sattva paripācana abhiyoga tayā

saṃskāra pratyayam vijñānam iti saṃskāra pratyaya tā vijñānānām an ucchedaḥ an upastambhaḥ ca
peyālam jāti pratyaya tā jarā maraṇasya an ucchedaḥ an upastambhaḥ ca
avidyā nirodhāt saṃskāra nirodhaḥ iti avidyā pratyaya tā bhāvāt saṃskārāṇām vyupaśamaḥ anupastambhaḥ ca
peyālam jāti pratyaya tā bhāvāt jarā maraṇasya vyupaśamaḥ anupastambhaḥ ca

original: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvabodhyāṅgāni paripūryante /
analyzed: asyām tu saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sarva buddha dharma samutthāpana tayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarva bodhyāṅgāni paripūryante
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yāni bodhisattvena prathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bodhisattvabhūmirityabhinirhṛtāni jñānābhinirhāraprayogāṅgāni,
analyzed: yāni bodhisattvena prathamām bodhisattva bhūmim upādāya yāvat saptamī bodhisattva bhūmiḥ iti abhinirhṛtāni jñāna abhinirhāra prayoga aṅgāni
imāni aṣṭamī bodhisattva bhūmim ārabhya yāvat atyanta paryavasānam iti anābhogena pariniṣpadyante

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvayorlokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭaviśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorekāntapariśuddhāśayaśca
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputrāḥ dvayoḥ lokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭa viśuddha āśayaḥ ca lokadhātoḥ ekānta pariśuddha āśayaḥ ca

original: lokadhātorlokāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahābhijñābalādhānāt,
analyzed: lokadhātoḥ loka āntarikāḥ duratikramāḥ na śakyāḥ yathā tathā atikramitum anyatra mahā abhijñā bala ādhānāt

original: evameva bho jinaputra vyāmiśrapariśuddhā bodhisattvacaryāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahāpraṇidhānopāyaprajñābhijñābalādhānāt
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputra vyāmiśra pariśuddhā bodhisattva caryā āntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathā tathā atikramitum anyatra mahā praṇidhāna upāya prajñā abhijñā bala ādhānāt

original: vimukticandra āha - kiṃ punarbho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu kleśacaryāsaṃkliṣṭā bodhisattvacaryā pratyetavyā?
analyzed: vimukticandraḥ āha kim punar bho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattva bhūmiṣu kleśa caryā saṃkliṣṭā bodhisattva caryā pratyetavyā

original: vajragarbha āha - prathamāmeva bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya sarvābodhisattvacaryāpagatakleśakalmāṣā bodhipariṇāmanādhipatyena pratyetavyā
analyzed: vajragarbhaḥ āha prathamām eva bho jinaputra bodhisattva bhūmim upādāya sarvā a bodhisattva caryā apagata kleśa kalmāṣā bodhi pariṇāmana ādhipatyena pratyetavyā
yathā bhāgi mārga sama tayā na ca
tāvat saptasu bodhisattva bhūmiṣu samatikrāntā kleśa caryā iti avācanīyā

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyaṃ hastiratnamabhirūḍhaścaturo dvīpānākramati,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyam hasti ratnam abhirūḍhaḥ caturaḥ dvīpān ākramati
manuṣya duḥkha dāridrya saṃkleśa doṣān ca prajānāti
na ca taiḥ doṣaiḥ lipyate
na ca tāvat samatikrāntaḥ manuṣya bhāvam bhavati

original: yadā punarmanuṣyāśrayaṃ hitvā brahmalokopapanno bhavati brāhmyavimānamabhirūḍhaḥ,
analyzed: yadā punar manuṣya āśrayam hitvā brahma loka upapannaḥ bhavati brāhmya vimānam abhirūḍhaḥ
sahasra lokadhātum alpa kṛcchreṇa paśyati anuvicarati
brahma pratibhāsam ca ādarśayati
na ca manuṣyaḥ iti prabhāvyate

original: evameva bhoḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitāyānābhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran saṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
analyzed: evam eva bhoḥ prathamām bhūmim upādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitā yāna abhirūḍhaḥ sarva jagat anuvicaran saṃkleśa doṣān prajānāti
na ca taiḥ doṣaiḥ lipyate samyak mārga abhirūḍha tvāt
na ca tāvat samatikrāntaḥ sarva jagat saṃkleśa doṣān vaktavyaḥ

original: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmeraṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavakrānto bhavati,
analyzed: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarva prāyogika caryām vihāya saptamyāḥ bhūmeḥ aṣṭamīm bodhisattva bhūmim avakrāntaḥ bhavati

original: tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānamabhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran sarvajagatsaṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
analyzed: tadā pariśuddham bodhisattva yānam abhirūḍhaḥ sarva jagat anuvicaran sarva jagat saṃkleśa doṣān prajānāti
na ca taiḥ doṣaiḥ lipyate samatikrānta tvāt lokatriyābhyaḥ

original: asyāṃ punarbho jinaputra sapyamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rāgādipramukhaṃ sarvakleśagaṇaṃ samatikrānto bhavati /
analyzed: asyām punarbho jinaputra bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhūyastvena rāga ādi pramukham sarva kleśa gaṇam samatikrāntaḥ bhavati

original: so 'syāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau caran bodhisattvo 'saṃkleśāniṣkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asyām dūraṃgamāyām bodhisattva bhūmau caran bodhisattvaḥ a saṃkleśa a niṣkleśaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: tatkasmāt? asamudācārātsarvakleśānāṃ na saṃkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: tat kasmāt asamudācārāt sarva kleśānām na saṃkleśaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ
tathāgata jñāna abhilāṣāt aparipūrṇa abhiprāya tvāt ca na niṣkleśaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo 'dhyāśayapariśuddhena kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
analyzed: saḥ asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ adhyāśaya pariśuddhena kāya karmaṇā samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: adhyāśayapariśuddhena vākkarmaṇā adhyāśayapariśuddhena manaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati /
analyzed: adhyāśaya pariśuddhena vāc karmaṇā adhyāśaya pariśuddhena manaḥ karmaṇā samanvāgataḥ bhavati
ye ca ime daśa akuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ tathāgata vivarṇitāḥ
tān sarveṇa sarvam samatikrāntaḥ bhavati

original: ye ceme daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānubhāvitāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca ime daśa kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddha anubhāvitāḥ
tān satata samitam anuvartate

original: yāni laukikāni śilpasthānakarmasthānāni yānyabhinirhṛtāni pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau,
analyzed: yāni laukikāni śilpasthāna karmasthānāni yāni abhinirhṛtāni pañcamyām bodhisattva bhūmau
tāni asya sarvāṇi anābhogataḥ evam pravartante

original: sa ācāryaḥ saṃmato bhavati trisāhasra mahāsāhasralokadhātau,
analyzed: saḥ ācāryaḥ saṃmataḥ bhavati tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātau
sthāpayitvā tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksambuddhān
aṣṭamīm bhūmim upādāya ca bodhisattvān

original: nāsya kaścitsamo bhavatyāśayena vā prayogeṇa vā /
analyzed: na asya kaścid samaḥ bhavati āśayena vā prayogeṇa vā
yāni ca imāni dhyānāni
samādhayaḥ sama pattayaḥ abhijñāḥ vimokṣāḥ ca
tāni asya sarveṇa sarvam āmukhībhavanti bhāvanā abhinirhāra ākāreṇa

original: na ca tāvadvipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya /
analyzed: na ca tāvat vipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tat yathā api nāma aṣṭamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya

original: asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvacittotpādeṣu prajñopāyabhāvanābalaṃ paripūryate /
analyzed: asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarva citta utpādeṣu prajñā upāya bhāvanā balam paripūryate
bhūyasyā mātrayā sarva bodhyaṅga paripūrim pratilabhate

original: so 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvasamādhi samāpadyate /
analyzed: saḥ asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayam ca nāma bodhisattva samādhi samāpadyate
su vicintita artham ca nāma
viśeṣamatim ca nāma
prabheda artha kośam ca
sarva artha vicayam ca
su pratiṣṭhita dṛḍha mūlam ca
jñāna abhijñā mukham ca
dharmadhātu parikarmam ca
tathāgata anuśaṃsam ca
vicitra artha kośa saṃsāra nirvāṇa mukham ca bodhisattva samādhim samāpadyate

original: sa evaṃpramukhāni mahābhijñājñānamukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi bhūmipariśodhikāni samāpadyate //
analyzed: saḥ evaṃpramukhāni mahā abhijñā jñāna mukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhi śata sahasrāṇi bhūmi pariśodhikāni samāpadyate

original: sa eṣāṃ samādhīnāmupāyaprajñāsupariśodhitānāṃ pratilambhānmahākaruṇābalena cātikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim,
analyzed: saḥ eṣām samādhīnām upāya prajñā su pariśodhitānām pratilambhāt mahā karuṇā balena ca atikrāntaḥ bhavati śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmim
abhimukhaḥ ca bhavati prajñā jñāna vicāraṇā bhūmeḥ

original: tasya asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyakarma nimittāpagataṃ pravartate /
analyzed: tasya asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇam kāya karma nimitta apagatam pravartate
apramāṇam vāc karma manaḥ karma nimitta apagatam pravartate su viśodhitam anutpattika dharma kṣānti avabhāsitam
vimukticandraḥ āha nanu bho jinaputra

original: prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacaryāṃ samatikrāntaṃ bhavati?
analyzed: prathamāyām eva bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇam kāya vāc manaḥ karma sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha caryām samatikrāntam bhavati
vajragarbhaḥ āha bhavati bho jinaputra
tat punar buddha dharma adhyālambana māhātmyena
na punar sva buddhi vicāreṇa

original: asyāṃ tu punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau svabuddhigocaravicārapratilambhādasaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavati /
analyzed: asyām tu punar saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sva buddhi gocara vicāra pratilambhāt asaṃhāryam śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ bhavati

original: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā rājakulaprasūto rājaputro rājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato jātamātra eva sarvāmātyagaṇamabhibhavati rājādhipatyena,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bhavantaḥ jinaputrāḥ rāja kula prasūtaḥ rāja putraḥ rāja lakṣaṇa samanvāgataḥ jāta mātraḥ eva sarva amātya gaṇam abhibhavati rāja ādhipatyena
na punar sva buddhi vicāreṇa

original: yadā punaḥ sa saṃvṛddho bhavati tadā svabuddhibalādhānataḥ sarvāmātyakriyāsamatikrānto bhavati,
analyzed: yadā punar sa saṃvṛddhaḥ bhavati tadā sva buddhi bala ādhānataḥ sarva amātya kriyā samatikrāntaḥ bhavati
evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ bodhisattvaḥ saha citta utpādena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhān abhibhavati adhyāśaya māhātmyena
na punar sva buddhi vicāreṇa

original: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ svaviṣayajñānaviśeṣamāhātmyāvasthitatvātsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakriyāmatikrānto
analyzed: asyām tu saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sva viṣaya jñāna viśeṣa māhātmya avasthita tvāt sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha kriyām atikrāntaḥ

original: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvo 'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito gambhīrasya vivittasyāpracārasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo lābhī bhavati /
analyzed: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvaḥ asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ gambhīrasya vivittasya a pracārasya kāya vāc manaḥ karmaṇaḥ lābhī bhavati
na ca uttaram viśeṣa parimārgaṇa abhiyogam avasṛjati
yena parimārgaṇa abhiyogena nirodha prāptaḥ ca bhavati
na ca nirodham sākṣātkaroti

original: vimukticandra āha - katamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate?
analyzed: vimukticandraḥ āha katamām bhūmim upādāya bodhisattvaḥ nirodham samāpadyate

original: vajragarbha āha - ṣaṣṭhīṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate /
analyzed: vajragarbhaḥ āha ṣaṣṭhīm bho jinaputra bodhisattva bhūmim upādāya bodhisattvaḥ nirodham samāpadyate

original: asyāṃ (Dbh 40) punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
analyzed: asyām dbh punar saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ citta kṣaṇe citta kṣaṇe nirodham samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca

original: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: tena so 'cintyena kāyavāṅmana skarmaṇā samanvāgata ityucyate /
analyzed: tena saḥ acintyena kāya vāc manaḥ karmaṇā samanvāgataḥ iti ucyate

original: āścaryaṃ bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
analyzed: āścaryam bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvaḥ bhūtakoṭi vihāreṇa ca viharati
na ca nirodham sākṣātkaroti

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalo mahāsāgare vārilakṣaṇābhijñaḥ paṇḍito
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ mahā sāgare vāri lakṣaṇa abhijñaḥ

original: vyakto medhāvī tatropagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgato mahāsāgare mahāyānapātrābhirūḍho
analyzed: vyaktaḥ medhāvī tatra upagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ mahā sāgare mahā yānapātra abhirūḍhaḥ
vahana kuśalaḥ ca bhavati
vāri kuśalaḥ ca bhavati
na ca mahā samudre vāri doṣaiḥ lipyate

original: evameva bho jinaputra asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñajñānamahāsāgarāvatīrṇaḥ pāramitāmahāyānapātrābhirūḍho  #
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputra asyām saptamyām bodhisattva bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajña jñāna mahā sāgara avatīrṇaḥ pāramitā mahā yānapātra abhirūḍhaḥ
bhūtakoṭi vihāreṇa ca viharati
na ca nirodham sākṣātkaroti
na ca sasṃkṛta atyanta vyupaśama vitarka doṣaiḥ lipyate

original: sa evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ samādhijñānabalabhāvanābhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatopāyaprajñābalādhānena saṃsāramukhaṃ cādarśayati /
analyzed: saḥ evam jñāna bala ādhāna prāptaḥ samādhi jñāna bala bhāvanā abhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatā upāya prajñā bala ādhānena saṃsāra mukham ca ādarśayati
nirvāṇa satata āśayaḥ ca bhavati
mahā parivāra parivṛtaḥ ca bhavati
satata samitam ca citta viveka pratilabdhaḥ bhavati
traidhātuka upapattim ca praṇidhāna vaśena abhinirharati sattva paripācana artham
na ca loka doṣaiḥ lipyate
śānta praśānta upaśāntaḥ ca bhavati
upāyena ca jvalati
jvalan ca na dahate
saṃvartate ca buddha jñānena
vivartate ca śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmibhyām
buddha jñāna viṣaya kośa prāptaḥ ca bhavati
māra viṣaya gataḥ ca dṛśyate
catur māra patha samatikrāntaḥ ca bhavati
māra viṣaya gocaram ca ādarśayati
sarva tīrthya āyatana upagataḥ ca dṛśyate
buddha tīrthya āyatana an utsṛṣṭa āśayaḥ ca bhavati
sarva loka kriyā anugataḥ ca dṛśyate
lokottara dharma gati samavasaraṇaḥ ca bhavati
sarva deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣya śakra brahma lokapāla atireka vyūha alaṃkāra viṭhapana aprāptaḥ ca bhavati
sarva buddha dharma ti manasikāram ca na vijahāti

original: tasyaivaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya asyāṃ saptasyāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti ... /
analyzed: tasya evam jñāna samanvāgatasya asyām saptasyām dūraṃgamāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavaḥ buddhāḥ ābhāsam āgacchanti
tān ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāsate

original: teṣāṃ ca sakāśādgauravacitrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti,
analyzed: teṣām ca sakāśāt gaurava citrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharma deśanām śṛṇoti
udgṛhṇāti dhārayati
śrutvā ca yathāvat samāpatti prajñā jñāna ālokena prayujyate
pratipattitaḥ ca ādhārayati
śāsana saṃdhārakaḥ ca bhavati teṣām buddhānām mahātmanām
asaṃhāryaḥ ca sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha abhisamaya paripṛcchāsu
tasya bhūyasyā mātrayā sattva anugrahāya gambhīra dharma kṣāntiḥ viśuddhi ati
tasya anekān kalpān tāni kuśala mūlāni uttapyante
pariśuddhi anti
karmaṇyāni ca bhavanti
paryavadānam ca āgacchanti

original: anekāni kalpaśatāni ... anekāni kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlānyuttapyante,
analyzed: anekāni kalpa śatāni anekāni kalpa koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi tāni kuśala mūlāni uttapyante
pariśuddhi anti
karmaṇyāni ca bhavanti
paryavadānam ca āgacchanti

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tadeva jātarūpaṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptataraṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tat eva jātarūpam sarva ratna pratyuptam bhūyasyā mātrayā uttaptataram bhavati
prabhāsvarataram bhavati
asaṃhāryataram ca bhavati anyābhyaḥ bhūṣaṇa vikṛtibhyaḥ

original: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ ... tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptatarāṇi (Dbh 41)
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputrāḥ tāni kuśala mūlāni upāya prajñā jñāna abhinirhṛtāni bhūyasyā mātrayā uttaptatarāṇi
bhavanti prabhāsvaratarāṇi

analyzed: daśa ākāram lokam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya upari khaga pathe sthitvā mahā raśmi jāla maṇḍalāni
kṛtvā uttaptaprabhāsam nāma mahat tathāgata pūjā upasthānam sarva tathāgatānām anupravartayanti
tasya pūjā upasthānasya prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat navamī bhūmi anupravartitam tathāgata pūjā upasthānam

original: tataḥ khalvapi mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalādyāvatī daśasu dikṣu niravaśeṣasarvadharmadhātvantargatā
analyzed: tatas khalu api mahā raśmi jāla maṇḍalāt yāvatī daśasu dikṣu niravaśeṣa sarva dharmadhātu antargatā
puṣpa prajñaptiḥ vā gandha dhūpa mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā vastra ābharaṇa maṇi ratna prajñaptiḥ vā
tatas atiriktatarāḥ sarva loka viṣaya samatikrāntāḥ lokottara kuśala mūla saṃbhāra ādhipatya abhinirvṛttāḥ
sarva ākāra guṇa saṃpannāḥ acintya nirvāṇa adhiṣṭhāna dhiṣṭhitāḥ nānā vyūha mahā ratna varṣāḥ iva
ekaika tathāgata parṣad maṇḍale mahā meghāḥ iva abhipravarṣanti sma

original: tāṃ ca ye sattvāḥ pūjāṃ saṃjānante,
analyzed: tām ca ye sattvāḥ pūjām saṃjānante
te sarve niyatāḥ bhavanti anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: evaṃrūpaṃ pūjopasthānaṃ pravartya tā raśmayaḥ punareva sarvāvanti tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya
analyzed: evaṃrūpam pūjā upasthānam pravartya tāḥ raśmayaḥ punar eva sarvāvanti tathāgata parṣad maṇḍalāni avabhāsya

original: daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmadhastātkramataleṣu astaṃ gacchanti /
analyzed: daśa ākāram lokam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya teṣām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām adhastāt krama taleṣu astam gacchanti

original: tatasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ viditaṃ bhavati - amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare evaṃcaryānugato bodhisattvo 'bhiṣekakālaprāpta iti
analyzed: tatas teṣām tathāgatānām teṣām ca bodhisattvānām viditam bhavati amuṣmin lokadhātu prasare evaṃcaryā anugataḥ bodhisattvaḥ abhiṣeka kāla prāptaḥ iti

original: tatra bho jinaputrā daśabhyo digbhyo 'paryantebhyo lokadhātuprasarebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāparyantā
analyzed: tatra bho jinaputrāḥ daśabhyaḥ digbhyaḥ aparyantebhyaḥ lokadhātu prasarebhyaḥ aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā aparyantā

original: abhiṣekabhūmiprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ kāyebhyaḥ śrīvatsālaṃkārādvajrasvastikāt sarvamāraśatruvijayo nāmaikaikā mahāraśmirdaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasraparivārā
analyzed: abhiṣeka bhūmi prāptānām ca bodhisattvānām kāyebhyaḥ śrīvatsa alaṃkārāt vajra svastikāt sarvamāraśatruvijayaḥ nāma ekaikā mahā raśmiḥ daśa raśmi asaṃkhyeya śata sahasra parivārā

original: niścarya daśadiśo 'vabhāsya aparyantāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdarśya tasya bodhisattvasya śrīvatsālaṃkāre vajrasvastika evāstaṃ gacchati /

original: samanantarādastamitāyāśca tasyā raśmyāḥ śatasahasraguṇottarā tasya bodhisattvasya balasthāmābhivṛddhiḥ prajñāyate //
analyzed: samanantarāt astamitāyāḥ ca tasyāḥ raśmyāḥ śata sahasra guṇa uttarā tasya bodhisattvasya bala sthāma abhivṛddhiḥ prajñāyate

original: atha khalu bho jinaputrāḥ sarvajñatābhijñāvatyo nāma raśmayasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmūrṇākośebhyo niścarantyasaṃkhyeyaparivārāḥ
analyzed: atha khalu bho jinaputrāḥ sarvajña tā abhijñāvatyaḥ nāma raśmayaḥ teṣām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām ūrṇā kośebhyaḥ niścaranti asaṃkhyeya parivārāḥ

original: tāḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu aśeṣataḥ sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu aśeṣatas sarva lokadhātūn avabhāsya daśa ākāram lokam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
mahānti tathāgata vikurvitāni saṃdarśya bahūni bodhisattva koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi
saṃcodya sarva buddhakṣetra prasarān ṣaṣ vikāram saṃprakampya sarva apāya cyuti gati upapattīḥ
praśamya sarva māra bhavanāni dhyāmīkṛtya sarva tathāgata abhisaṃbodhi vibuddha buddha āsanāni upasaṃdarśya
sarva buddha parṣad maṇḍala vyūha prabhāvam nidarśya dharmadhātu paramān ākāśa dhātu paryavasānān
sarva lokadhātūn avabhāsya punar eva āgatya tam sarvāvantam bodhisattva parṣad saṃnipātam upari upari pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
mahā vyuhān nidarśya tāḥ raśmayaḥ tasya bodhisattvasya uttamāṅge astam gacchanti

original: tatparivāraraśmayaśca tathā saṃnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śirassvantardhīyante sma /
analyzed: tad parivāra raśmayaḥ ca tathā saṃnipatitānām teṣām bodhisattvānām śirassu antardhīyante sma

original: samanantarasaṃnipatitābhiśca tābhī raśmibhiste bodhisattvā apratilabdhapūrvāṇi daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhante /
analyzed: samanantara saṃnipatitābhiḥ ca tābhiḥ raśmibhiḥ te bodhisattvāḥ a pratilabdha pūrvāṇi daśa samādhi śata sahasrāṇi pratilabhante

original: tāśca raśmayastulyakālaṃ tasya bodhisattvasyottamāṅge nipatitā bhavanti /
analyzed: tāḥ ca raśmayaḥ tulya kālam tasya bodhisattvasya uttamāṅge nipatitāḥ bhavanti
sa ca bodhisattvaḥ abhiṣiktaḥ iti ucyate samyaksaṃbuddha viṣaye

original: daśabalaparipūryā tu samyaksaṃbuddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
analyzed: daśa bala paripūryā tu samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā yo rājñaścakravartinaḥ putro jyeṣṭhaḥ kumāro 'gryamahiṣīprasūtaścakravartirājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato bhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputrāḥ yaḥ rājñaḥ cakravartinaḥ putraḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ kumāraḥ agrya mahiṣī prasūtaḥ cakravarti rāja lakṣaṇa samanvāgataḥ bhavati

original: iti hi bho jinaputrā aprameyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānavaipulyamapramāṇamevāsyāṃ bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasyāvatārajñānam //
analyzed: iti hi bho jinaputrāḥ aprameyam buddhānām bhagavatām jñāna vaipulyam apramāṇam eva asyām bhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya avatāra jñānam

original: sa khalu punarbho jinaputrā bodhisattva evamimāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate /

original: tara bho jinaputra tadyathāpi nāma himavān parvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvabhaiṣajyajātigrahaṇatayā,
analyzed: tara bho jinaputra tat yathā api nāma himavān parvatarājaḥ ākaraḥ sarva bhaiṣajya jātīnām aparyantaḥ sarva bhaiṣajya jāti grahaṇa tayā

analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputra pramuditāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ ākaraḥ bhavati

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra gandhamādano mahāparvatarāja ākaraḥ sarvagandhajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvagandhajātigrahaṇena,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bho jinaputra gandhamādanaḥ mahā parvata rājaḥ ākaraḥ sarva gandha jātīnām aparyantaḥ sarva gandha jāti grahaṇena

analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputra vimalāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ ākaraḥ bhavati

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra vaidalyo mahāparvatarājaḥ śuddho ratnamaya ākaraḥ sarvaratnajātīnāmaparyantaḥ sarvalaukikaratnajātigrahaṇena,

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra ṛṣigirirmahāparvatarājaḥ pañcābhijñānāmṛṣīṇāmaparyantaḥ pañcābhijñarṣigaṇanayā,

evam eva bho jinaputra arciṣmatyām buddha bhūmau sarva mārga amārga antara avatāra nirdeśa viśeṣa jñānānām aparyantaḥ sarva mārga amārga antara viśeṣa jñāna paripṛcchā nirdeśaiḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra yugaṃdharo mahāparvatarājaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvayakṣamaharddhikagaṇanayā,

original: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra sumerurmahāparvatarājaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikānāmaparyantaḥ sarvadevamaharddhikagaṇanayā,

original: yathā khalu punarime bho jinaputra daśa mahāratnaparvatā mahāsamudrasaṃbhūtā mahāsamudraprabhāvitāḥ,

bahu ratnataḥ ca gambhīra duravagāhataḥ ca vipula apramāṇataḥ ca mahābhūta āvāsataḥ ca sthita velā an atikramaṇataḥ ca
sarva megha vāri saṃpratyeṣaṇā tṛptitaḥ ca

arciṣmatyām bodhisattva bhūmau buddha bhedya prasāda eka rasataḥ

dūraṃgamāyām bodhisattva bhūmau buddhi pravicaya kauśalya vipula apramāṇataḥ
acalāyām bodhisattva bhūmau mahāvyūha abhinirhāra saṃdarśana mahā bhūta āvāsataḥ

original: tadyathāpi bho jinaputra mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yadā daśa ratnagotrāṇyatikramya abhyutkṣiptaṃ

analyzed: ca bhavati kuśala karmāra su paritāpitam ca su paripiṇḍitam ca su pariśodhitam ca su paryavadāpitam

original: ca sarvāvabhāsapramuktaṃ ca rājānujñātaṃ ca bhavati,
analyzed: ca sarva avabhāsa pramuktam ca rāja anujñātam ca bhavati

original: evameva bho jinaputra yadā bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajñatāratnacittotpādo daśāryaratnagotrāṇyatikramyotpanno bhavati (Dbh 67)
analyzed: evam eva bho jinaputra yadā bodhisattvānām sarvajña tā ratna citta utpādaḥ daśa ārya ratna gotrāṇi atikramya utpannaḥ bhavati
dhūta guṇa saṃlekha śīla vrata tapaḥ su paritāpitaḥ ca dhyāna samādhi samāpatti su paripiṇḍitaḥ ca
mārga aṅga ākāra su pariśodhitaḥ ca upāya abhijñā su paryavadāpitaḥ ca pratītyasamutpāda su nirviddhaḥ ca
upāya prajñā vicitra ratna sūtra su āviddhaḥ ca vaśitā mahā vaiḍūrya maṇi ratna daṇḍa dhvaja agra avaropitaḥ ca
sattva carita pratyavekṣaṇa śruta jñāna avabhāsa saṃprayuktaḥ ca tathāgata dharmarāja samyaksaṃbuddha jñāna abhiṣeka anugataḥ ca bhavati
tadā sarva sattvānām sarva buddha kārya ratna saṃgrahāya pratyupasthitaḥ bhavati

analyzed: vimukticandraḥ bodhisattvaḥ āha yeṣām punar bho jinaputra ayam sarva ākāra sarvajña jñāna guṇa saṃcayaḥ dharma mukha parivartaḥ śravaṇa avabhāsam āgamiṣyati

original: vajragarbho bodhisattva āha - yāvān bho jinaputra sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvastāvān sarvajñatācittotpādasaṃgrahālambanātpuṇyopacayaḥ syāt /

original: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
analyzed: dharmameghām tatas prāptaḥ maheśvaraḥ bhavet kṛtī
tatrasthaḥ pālayan sattvān sarva ākāra anubodhanaiḥ
sarva ākāra vare jñāne pratiṣṭhāpya prabodhayan
svayam jñāne pratiṣṭhitvā parān ca api niyojayet
sarvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpya jñāna pāraṃgataḥ bhavet
etad puṇya anubhāvaiḥ ca daśa bhūmi īśvaraḥ jinaḥ
sarva ākāra guṇa ādhāraḥ sarvajñaḥ dharmarāj bhavet
iti matvā bhavadbhiḥ ca saṃbodhi pada labdhaye
daśa pāramitā pūryai caritavyam samāhitaiḥ

original: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
analyzed: tathā bodhim śivām prāpya catur mārān vijitya ca
sarvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpya nirvṛtim samavāpsyatha
etat śrutvā parijñāya caradhvam bodhi sādhane
nirvighnam bodhim āsādya labhadhvam saugatām gatim
